record.title: PROVIDING FOR AN ADJOURNMENT OR RECESS OF THE TWO HOUSES

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I send to the desk a privileged concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 103) and ask for its immediate consideration.

record.narrative: The Clerk read the concurrent resolution, as follows:
record.chair: The question is on the concurrent resolution.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on that I demand the yeas and nays.

record.narrative: The yeas and nays were ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 213, on H. Con. Res. 103, I am not recorded. Had I been present, I would have voted "nay."
Mr. Speaker, I was unavoidably detained by a meeting in my office during rollcall vote 213 providing for a conditional adjournment of the two Houses. If I had been present, I would have voted "nay."
